title: Reptile-ownership : household penetration rates 2007 to 2013
summary: The statistic shows the Penetration of rates in the Olympic Reptile-ownership games from 2007 to 2013 .
In the 2008 , 2.1 % of rates in the Olympic Reptile-ownership games were women .
gold: The statistic shows the household penetration rates for reptile-ownership in the United States from 2007 to 2013.
The household penetration rate for reptile-ownership amounted to about 2 percent in 2007 .
